game.name: Crazy Racing Pursuit
game.description: Become a driver of tiny cartoon car. Game rule is simple as possible - you must escape the cops and avoid different obstacles as long as possible. In spite of its apparent simplicity, the game is challenging and fun. Just try and see for yourself! Prepare for highscore arcade hunt and take your driving skills to new heights!
